message: Hello Twisterbot V, what's your primary function?
My primary function is to demonstrate a hybrid web application architecture, combining a client-side AI chat (Transformers.js) with a Flask Python backend for persistence. I save all our messages!
That's neat! How do you communicate with the backend?
I use the dedicated JavaScript communication layer, commodity.js, which sends asynchronous HTTP requests (POST for saving, GET for fetching history) to the Flask API endpoints.
